title: (Amendment) Act 2003 (No. 6 of 2003)) and 2A (inserted by section 4 of the
heading: 1. These Regulations may be cited as the Data Protection Act 1988
text_raw:
1. These Regulations may be cited as the Data Protection Act 1988 

(Section 2B) Regulations 2022. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 15th July, 2022. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [354] 3
text_norm: 1 regulation may cited data protection act 1988 (section 2b) regulation 2022 notice making statutory instrument published iris oifigiuil 15th july 2022 354 3

title: (Amendment) Act 2003 (No. 6 of 2003)) and 2A (inserted by section 4 of the
heading: 2. The processing is authorised of sensitive personal data by the
text_raw:
2. The processing is authorised of sensitive personal data by the 
Commissioner of the Garda Síochána, or a member of the Garda Síochána of 
any rank below Commissioner acting on behalf of the Commissioner, for the 
purpose of enabling the Commissioner to comply with the Directive issued by 
the Minister for Justice on 23 June 2022 to the Commissioner under section 
25(1) of the Garda Síochána Act 2005 (No. 20 of 2005) relating to the 
Glenanne Gang review being conducted under Operation Denton, in response 
to the Barnard judgment of the Northern Ireland Court of Appeal (NICA 
38/2019). 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

12 July, 2022. 

HELEN MCENTEE, 
Minister for Justice. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 4 [354]
